node.text: Sometimes my ego can get bruised... The ego is your conscious mind, considered your self. It is the voice that says “I am freaking awesome, I can do it!” It is also the voice that says, “hey ding dong, maybe you should warm up before going crow, headstand, crow, chatarunga on camera...” #ego #crow #bakasana #armbalance #headstand #yogafail #yogaeveryday #yogaeverydamnday #yogaeverygreatday

Trying to be a bit softer and slower moving around post Xmas is the challenge 🦃😨super excited to come back to London to teach and practice 🥰🥰🥰Just wanted to offer a tip on crow shifts and crane (last part of this video) . I personally find easier in crane (straight arms) to place my knees right under my armpits if I just have to balance and stay there. But in crow shifts (arms bent) my knees are just above my elbows as it makes it easier to move and personally less of a bruise experience for the triceps. I can then do whatever I like with the floating leg extended back into one leg crow - bring it forward or simply do crow shifts. I hope it helps. It helped me to balance in one leg crow at the beginning and now it makes no difference how high I position my knee as I can always find the balance. See if changing the knee position makes it possible for you too❤️❤️❤️❤️ #crow #bakasana #ekapadabakasana #crowshifts #handstand #balance #yoga

Saw this funky-handed Crow Pose / #bakasana on #OurNewYearYoga yoga challenge and thought it paired well with morning coffee. 
Mille grazie to @yoga_garage for the direct inspiration and also thanks to challenge hosts @satoko_yogini @chiaki.yoga @faithfoxmama

#enjoythejourney #leagueofextraordinaryyogis #yogaprogress #yogachallenge

#yogateacher #yogi #bakasana #winteryoga

Flying start of the week. 
Getting to places early✔. Slowly finding my rhythm for the day✔ Calm breaths✔. Few stretches✔ Heavy, grounded steps✔. Strong hand shakes✔Give out few warm smiles and Hello's ✔Ready 😎✌👌💥✔. #mondaymorning #haveagoodday #yoga #headstand #bakasana #vinyasaflow #flowyoga #itsok #movementismedicine #kizombalove #yogalover

Motivation 💫
This pic was taken by my 7 year old niece last summer when the two of us where fooling around on the playground. She didn’t only take a few fab photos, but also wanted to do the pose! Well - it didn’t work at the time... Fast forward to Xmas Day and to my big surprise, she secretly practiced it on her own and was sooooo proud to show me 💞💞💞
We have a no pics of kids on the web policy in the family, so please take my word for it - and have a chuckle that after both daughter and big sis performed this trick in front of the tree, my brother managed to do it too (that was definitely ego 😂). The key message here is not that it’s easy - my niece put in the work and my brother is athletic, strong and flexible. It’s that if you believe it’s possible, have no fear, the unthinkable is doable. It may take time though, be patient with yourself!
#yogaeverydamnday #yogaplay #yogafun #yogadaily #trustyourself #believeyoucan #patience #yogamotivation #yogagoals #bakasana #crowpose #armbalanceaddict #yogaforeveryone #londonyogi #yogalondon #londonfitness #londonyogateacher #bestrong

node.text: Took this a few weeks ago AFTER i finished teaching evening class, playing around with floating my legs in inversion & working on Crow, I like to video myself so I can see alignment and whats happening (when your upside down it gets confusing 🤪) and anyway it wasnt until I watched replay I noticed the holes in my pants 🙈😂 Stumbled across it again today and it made me giggle so thought Id share 😆 wonder if anyone in class noticed 🙊💁🏻‍♀️😄 #wellused #holypants #toofunny #play #fun #lovelifeliveyoga #yoga #inversion #tripodheadstand #crowpose #bakasana #practiceandalliscoming

node.text:
Hey hey triangle makers!! Are you ready to make some triangles with us??? I know I am. This is our third round and I can’t be more excited ❤❤❤
.
Day 1 (Monday) of #TriYourAsana3 is a side crow variation. Look closely at the picture because I kept doing this one wrong! .
Start like you are going to practice side crow. Extend the arm that your leg is not resting on. Extend the leg that is resting on your arm  and bend your top leg. If you can’t finger tip it, feel free to place your palm on the floor. ✌🏼
.
Each day we will give you the pose of the day and copy it to the best of your abilities. And have fun!!! 🤗
.
Triangle hosts: 🔺
.
@jadebellyyoga 🔺
@kamaste_ 🔺
@stephainekicksbutt 🔺
.
Triangle sponsor: 🔺
.
@goamagicfashion 🔺 .
.
.
#sidecrow #sidecrowvariation #armbalance #parsvabakasana #bakasana #bakasanavariation

node.accessibility_caption: Image may contain: one or more people and shoes

node.text:
İnsan engellidir doğuştan. Gözleridir engeli. Kulaklarıdır. Gördükleridir. Yerler, insanlar, sesler sınırlar onu. Aynı zamanda özgür kılar. Özgürlüğünü arar kah sessiz, kah direnişçi çığlıklarla. Çoğu zaman ne aradığını bilmeden, nerde bulacağı hakkında fikirler yürüterek... Ülkeler şehirler gezmek isteyişi, yeni insanlar tanımak, şarkı söylemek, dans etmek isteyişi hep bundandır. “İstek”, isteme durumunun NEDEN ve nereden geldiğini sorguladığımda benim karşıma çıkan bu oldu. İnsanın yalnız kalmak isteyişi, bir olmak isteyişi bazen tek, bazen kalabalıklarla, hep bundandır. Tüm bu taşkınlığı ruhunu özgürleştirmek içindir. 
Bir artı bir ikidir. Bu, yaşamın sıradan kısmıdır. 1+1 üç ettiğinde, işte o zaman hayat değişmeye başlar. İnsan 1+1’inin 3 ettiği yeri bulmak ister. Orada özgürleşir. Orada, yaşam amacını bulur. İş, aşk olur. Emek, aş olur. Kişi parlar ve aydın olur, yol gösterir.
Kiminin iki ettiği yerde bazısı üçü bulur. İşte yaşam budur. Özgürleşmek. Çılgınca ve doyasıya! 
#venusretrograde #venus #chiron #suneclipse #lucifer #astroloji #horoscope #namaste🙏 #yoga #yogi #asana #sirsasana #hathayoga #yinyoga #yoginiforlife #bakasana #yogagirl #yogainspiration #acroyoga #hathayoga #falakasana #yogagirls #yogachallenge #yogini #workandlove #vinyasaflow #yogaeverywhere #yogaeverydaymnday #yogankara #yogapants #yogachallenge #yogi #yinyoga #virabadrasana2

node.text:
Lunedì 7 Gennaio: Non ti temo sappilo! 💪🏼🔥
A parte che non ho ancora messo via gli addobbi natalizi, ma giuro che lo faccio 🤞🏼!!! Per la mia pratica di oggi ho deciso di partire con questa #asana perché sentivo la necessità di fare spazio in equilibrio. 
In queste vacanze ho studiato molte cose interessanti sulle metodologie di allenamento specifico per carattereotipo. Sai di che cosa si tratta? 
Sono orgogliosa di annunciarvi che insieme ad @integrazione_fasciale abbiamo definito molte cose per il progetto @fascia.food.fitness 
Io sono pronta per riprendere e tu?
.
#charactertraining #yoga #bakasana #pierpt #fascia #fasciafitness #integrazionefascile #workout #wod #carattereotipo #personaltrainer #pilates #prenditicuradite #fitness #fitlife #functionaltraining #vinyasaflow #progetti #fasciafoodfitness #peakpose #yogastateofmind

node.accessibility_caption: Image may contain: 1 person, sitting, shoes and outdoor
Image may contain: one or more people, people sitting, shoes, living room and indoor

node.text:
Crow, or Bakasana, is one of the first hand balancing postures I practiced when I started yoga. When I was younger, it came easily. I had a strong core (can we say 6 pack - say whaaaaaat 😳). However, that changed after I got pregnant and had my son 👶
.
I ended up having an emergency C-Section and recovery has taken me, quite literally, years. My muscles were totally shot and it took me a year before I even felt comfortable doing consecutive crunches. Now, I feel much stronger and as I was scrolling through photos I found my crow (or baby crow some would say) from a year ago, and my crow pose from last month. My son is 5 - and that’s how long it has taken me. Some recoveries don’t take that long, but keep in mind with resolutions sometimes it doesn’t take a week, month, or even year. This is a continual practice and a huge shoutout to those who have undergone surgery, injury, childbirth, or weight fluctuations. I see you, I hear you, and we are on this journey together ✌🏻
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
. .
#yogapracticedaily #yogicommunity #yogabody #yogisofig #vegan #veganfit #yoga #yogacommunity #yogaeverywhere #yogaeverydamnday #yogalife #yogalifestyle #yogatransformation #bakasana #crowpose #yogabody #veganathlete #vegantransformation #yogafam #yogamom #yogaathome #homepracticeyoga #homepractice
